episodes.note: Continuing from where we left off.
Parent drama. Apart from the prospect of being separated from whats-her-face...there isn't much point to this
His Dad was only half cheating!...Kinda not really.
Hurray for Ayado and Itou
Backup characters getting some focus..nothing much to say
I like the progress on Ishino and whats his names relationship
How whipped is this guy? Sure the teacher's a dipshit, but dude, do be so thirsty hahah
The secrets out!
Time skip... he's moved on...will be interesting to see if they get together in the end
The drama was lame. The ending was forced and meh - what the fuck Itou?
The best girls were the rich ones who cameo'd! They'll probably turn up again
Nice uniforms! These episodes are too short to tell the story well...need at least 5min
Boobs
Yes, yes, find the cat - can't have loli's crying
pool episode
Maid outfits
Silly little show...
Mermaids..and an undersea adventure
Yes, yes cute mermaids...not sure what the point of this episode was in the scope of the series story.
This show is dull. It even fails at being cute when you compare it to other shows
...Forgettable
I think I missed something there about what the monster was..., but not a bad start
OKay, now I know why I didn't get it. They're jumping around in the chronology. I wish they'd make the characters more different visually.
Hmmm...case resolved.
Setup for the next story..what is the guy's power?
Still looking for the guy who can see peoples roses....
Meh..lot of talking
This arc sure is taking its time...
That arc was lame.
Okay...so will he come back then?
Hmm... what's supernatural about serial killer(?) lady?
So what's the goal of this King of Distortion? What does he get by messing with these people
This Habara pimp knows what's up.
I slept through most of it...
I'm being generous. The early stories were good. The later ones were meh.
Its back, but no best girl Kurumi?!
STandard date stuff...where's my Kurumi?!
Natsumi defeated. Everyone became a loli!
Working to get on Natsumi's good side...while plots be happening - Where's Kurumi?!
Natsumi helped save the day! Natsumi arc complete?
More setup as we get his Origami arc underway
Cunts. How dare they tease me with 10sec of Kurumi!
KURUMI shows up and we get the best episode of the season. Coincidence?
Loli Kurumi was cute. Did he save them? How is he alive?
More Origami crap. At least Kurumi shows up
Some final drama from Origami... that better be done with now.
Nice ending for the season. Overall not enough Kurumi and the Origami stuff was meh - cause I don't like her
50/50 for Live action and anime. Not great
The teacher taking his cash was funny..
The cringe kids are back and they fixed the goody two shoes guy
No miracles of quality yet... of course I knew that from ep.1
More poop-tier entertainment
Something I believed impossible. The final episode was actually worse than all the others.
This is going to be a winner. The situation is so ridiculous it's awesome.
He needs to get over his teacher and be with Rui
Ditch sensei and get with Rui. Fumiya was knocking it out the park this week.
Bit melodramtic. Apparently the "affair" stuff is resolved? Bet we'll see Shuu again though
Definitely a good move not sleeping with the distrubed girl. He should be her friend though.
So Kiriya's a wrongun'
The nee-san's arguements are weak as fuck. Cunt makes minimal sense. Also who the fuck masturbates with the door open? Girl is cracked.
I'm over the teacher. Ditch her dude, stick with Rui - or go for the 3 way
I know I wanted this ship briefly at the beginning but no. Stop the BS and be with Rui
Confrontation!
Well in, he finally smashed. Glad he ignored her attempts to break up, Predictable that the school found out
This guy! He just keeps switching between the sisters. Overall it was trashy drama, that was infuriating and irritatingly enjoyable
Great first episode. I'm liking it a lot.
I remember this from the 60s version. Very much liked this take on it. Bandai was hot.
Hyakkimaru backstory on how he got his prosthetics. Was a good story.
The demon sword was cool. Hyakkimaru got his hearing back!
Slower episode..but well done. The old man is back! Hearing is hard, and now he has his voice back?!
The first half sort of dragged, but the overall story arc paid off great - even though I sort of predict the end. Hyakkimaru beastmode
I'm a sucker for monster girls. I'm shipping those two. Hyakkimaru's vision powers are cool. I like that it reacts to intent not just demons
Monster of the week, even had a happy ending. Nose restored! The sky centipede reminds me of Slither the sky dragon
Dororo's backstory is depressing. Largely that Itachi bastards fault.
Focused on Tahomaru this week. I liked that he isn't actually a cunt. He's just a proud guy, but he's heroic I guess.
Good episode. Moving towards the confrontation!
Disastrous family reunion. Well executed. I like that they showed Tahomaru's "journey" to siding with his father, rather than blind loyalty
Chill episode. What's the map on Dororo? Also, Hyakkimaru's beginning to talk more now!
The story was a little obvious as it went on, but Sabame not being the demon was a good "twist"
Moth monster dispatched. Morality questions...Looks like Dororo's map will be the story focus next.
Itachi - what a twat. Demon shark next week?!

series.title: Doukyonin wa Hiza, Tokidoki, Atama no Ue.

episodes.note: Cool. I like the fact that we get to hear the cats thoughts
Not enough cat. At least Haru has a name now
Hurray for Haru-chan. Cheering her human up.
The cat's inner voice really makes the show
Nice. Haru reunites with her little brother and browner is getting closer with her
We got to see more cat backstory.
Motherfucker bringing children over would get a backhand if it was my house
Average episode. Not enough cat.
Cat was on point this week.
Ship of the season - this dude and his cat. It'd be cool if cats, or animals in general, actually had thoughts like that.
More feels for Subaru. Not enough Haru. Looks like setup for an emotional - but happy - last episode
Enjoyable. At its best when showing Haru's point of view. Ship of the season
I imaging this not being that great. Looks like standard fantasy/harem show...although no harem has appeared yet
I thought this bro was the MC? Will he resurrect next episode?!
So is stella the new main character now that the joshua died?
Things only continue to worsen. Hopefully there will be some pay off to the trails they're facing
She got some balls, but her aides neutered her decision - probably a good idea. Harold was badass this ep
That was a little different. Guess they were trying to emphasise the horrors of war - which this series is all about
Izana going out in a hail of gunfire like a boss
Her subordinates are dropping like flies
The body count on this is crazy. Most of the key characters have died at this point
They've got a plan but looks like one last fight before that
Cool ending. Knew Layla would die somehow.
CGDCT but isekai yuusha versus the demon lord...who happens to be nearby thing
Nothing all that fun happened.
Dull episode
Hmmm...evil "god" of the week
Hmm..
Troubles of the maou!
Lunatic princess making trouble for the hero
Hmm...not feeling it
Maooooo-chan outed herself. I like Golem-chan
All wrapped up nicely in the end. Nothing really stood out during the series - I'm sure it'll fade into obscurity
Characters look cool, but we can't expect much from the story - it is based on a game
Not feeling that backstory.
2.5yrs since S1, a safe start starting of more Youkai business
ByeBye Kinako!
Trouble with the executive..!
Superpowered, but can't control it - standard stuff
So the executive issue was resolved...just like that. Kinda lame
The youkai in the first half was cute
Nice cliffhanger
We've learnt a little more about Sakae...but there are still questions.
Hmm..not blown away, will probably be a middling series
Gripen has shot up the seasonal best girl ranks. Her chopstick technique is cute
Girl number 2 is here. Poor Gripen can't catch a break
Finallly! Been waiting for them to go up together
A new daughter who doesn't play nice. Not much else to the episode.
He's winning Phantom over with his pilot abilities!
So-so episode. Not enough Gripen!
Hmm...bit of a wasted episode
Waste of time. Nothing really happened
Hmm. It just sort of ended... I enjoyed the first half more, when the focus was on Gripen and Kei.
It was a good start.
Miku episode. The bit where he was suppose to be confused between Yotsuba and Miku was bad. All she did was put on a ribbon dude.
Were in the Nino cunt phase. The series really tries to test beliveablility when it comes to telling people apart
The idea anyone would confuse the girls was flimsy in the manga but completely BS in the anime...the cliches grind as well
Mistaking the sisters for each other is just unbelievable if they all have different fucking hair colours!
This series continues to irritate me. Which is a same cause the potential is high
Yeah...put a wig on and she wouldn't know who you are..for fuck sake.
Run of the mill harem romance...hijinks and non-committale ending
Fairy tale fanatasy but the original stories are twisted...so-so
Origin of one of the main characters, mixed with Cinderella
Treasure Island...was so so
Snow white's story wasn't tampered with all that much. Another story zone saved
Very "story-zone of the week". The stories were okay, mostly because they were inspired by real fairy tales and such
What?
Awful.

series.title: Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai: Tensai-tachi no Renai Zunousen

episodes.note: Good adaption so far. The narrator should be kept to a minimum though
When's Ishigami showing up!?
That ending was brilliant
Some laughs were had, the french bit fell flat though.
Moderately amusing this week. When is Ishigami turning up?
Ishigami! He's gotta be the highlight of the series for me.
Ishigami skit stole the show for me as always
Meh week. Nothing all that good. Fujiwara with Shirogane's sister was fun
Ishigami raving about women was great
The best bit was the Ramen scene - and the old salary man made it great
Fun RomCom with the twist just like the manga.
Interesting to jump straight into the gamble..good for manga readers at least.
Yumeko's face when Ikishima broke the rules haha
Saotome and Ririka come to help Suzui fight the eye-shadow girls. I don't remember how this one played out (Pretty sure Mary wins though)
Yumeko saved, looks like a Kirari focus next week?
Blanking on this bit from the manga - loving the reaction faces though. Kirari smashing the votes
Kakegurui reaction faces are top shelf. Yumeko losing her shit when people ruin her gambles are hilarious
I like depressed Manyuda better than arrogant Manyuda. He's great.
Not a lot of Yumeko this gamble. Not a fan of Sumeragi
Hurray for the President..but not all that great an episode.
I love the stylised hyper saturation of colour when characters are displaying their craziness.
Fun episode. Rei coming to the forefront was expected, cool anyway though
Not really impressed with the ending. Overall Kakegurui is great though. (The mystery woman was definitely Yumeko's mum right?)
Another adventure trying to figure out what the human is
Panfda girls were cute. I preferred Red Panda
Dolphin and Seas lion...was okay.
The animals play with the picture was fun
Skipping talking about the epiosde - Tiger at the end? Another human?! Who knows Serval!?
Cheetah vs Pronhorn was fun
PPP!
Dog was fun. I wonder if tiger - the beast - can be "cured"
Kyururu is in trouble!
Fun. I like that all the characters got to show up again
I think season 1 was better overall. This season had its moments though - the race and Giant Panda-san
Not bad. It got more interesting when the "human" guy show'd up
Mostly setup for their journey. I like that hard-ass nee-san is totally into the guy
Slow episode - but now a new  "red girl" appears
Hmm...more mysteries when it comes to the "new sister"
Well their happiness was short lived. Off to battle next week?
Poor roomba's. Sacrificed themselves for the journey.
I'm more and more interested as to what is causing the "dead sisters" to appear.
Some of the sisters are out? We might finally be unravelling the red mystery
Cool reveal. Now we just need to know what happened to the first person and where the red heads came from.
The show got better over time. Cool story. The ending was alright too. I think I understood what went on.
Dogfighting mercenary girls. Seems cool
The owner ladies are hot.
What was the Mayor doing!? Least none of the girls got hurt!
Sexy dancers were hot..but dancing was weird. The art girl was cute.
Julia got balls - didn't even flinch!
Kylie backstory. Cool dogfight with the mystery fighter.
I'm enjoying this series. It's ever so slightly unique.
They were in hot water this week, but all was solved in the end. I wonder if their airship will actually be out of comission next week?
Naomi's  design is good, but the mouth animation when they were arguing was awful
Confrontation with the Union.
Enjoyable. Decent CG. One of the few plane anime out there too
Great first episode. Retired magical girl with PTSD coming out of retirement to fight terrorism!
The yuri vibes are strong with these two.
Everone's friends..but looks like trouble ahead.
Nozomi's having a rough time. Glad Rapture jumped in for the save rather than the surrendering BS
Rapture is OP, but Jou-ou just walked in like it was nothing. Rapture joins M Squad! She should reliveve the memories with Nozomi!
War nurse with the strong yuri aura hahha.
Generous score. Just terrorist of the week
Tabira is hot. Even better that she's voiced by Ohara. We need so Ara-Ara's stat. Otherwise a build up for the conflict
They better not have killed Tabira off?
Tabira survived! and is cute in fluffy form. Not surprised that Chisato's injuries were orchastrated.
Pretty standard action show in the end. I much preferred the first half. The characters were what let the show down - Tabira hot though
Interesting start. Needs more dragon girl
Molting! The Yuri with these 2 is strong
I got the point of the episode, but it wasn't all that engaging. Was "nice"
Hmm...it being a drill was a little lame. Also I'm not watching this for the action - give me more Anne x Crea
That lagoon place they spent the episode at was cool.
Hide and seek. Wasn't super into the episode. Anne hyper creepy at the end ahha
Lame episode. No real development between the characters or any fun happenings. Didn't care for the song.
I'm not loving these episodes with minimal interactions between the leads. I do like how it frames their relationship though
Nice show. Some of the episode were a little boring but the main characters were fun - nice dynamic
Waste of time. Seemed like a dvd special type thing
So-so first episode.
Cool. The psychic in the park bit was funny.
67% exorcism of the week - nothing to write home about
Looks like Mob lost the fight?!
I wasn't blown away by thte episode, but it was good
Reigen is trying to turn over a new leaf. Watching him have a meltdown cause Mob left was comical
The feels! While Reigen is a complete tool - he is a decent guy at heart
Average episode until the last 2 minutes when shit got real! ???%
It's all going down now - the fact that the Mob ??? was just a tease is lame...but he was cool for ~2min
Dimple the real MVP this episode.
SELF DEFENCE RUSH
Start of the final fight - this should be great
Good season. The ending was as great as I was hoping - set myself up to be lightly disappointed
It seemed like a chill CGDCT show, until the end when we got dimensional magical girls...think Gochuu x Akanesasu
I like that the manga they're trying to get is definitely an allousion to GochuUsa. Glad they didn't take a dark route with the "villians"
Rosen Maiden this week. Seems like the show is going to stick to "save the series" of the week formula.
Considering the childish nature of the show, the ending is ridiculously ecchi.
Ryuuou no Oshigoto was the series that needed saving this week
I'm really loving the ending of the show...that's about it
In a game this week rather than a manga - and the antagonist only shows up for 10sec
I like Kaoruko. There's something about that "posh girl" way of speaking that is fun
The best thing about the show is the ED animation. I've already forgotten the show.
Some super pro failed...nothing else happend...
Backstory for some guy we don't care about. We need more of the MC's
I'm not feeling this season at all. It's lost that spark
Kai's killing it and I don't recognise these songs. Give me something I know please
These judges are so far from impartial - at least it looked that way
Quit mopping dude. Why don't you go practice or something
Killing time until Pang Wei
Kai won. This season didn't hook me at all.
The last 3 minutes were great...the run up to that not so much. It could be a rollercoaster of quality
Daisuke's fucking annoying. Quit throwing a fit.
The revisions rep looks to be a babe. Fingers crossed we'll see a lot more of her
Bunny-chan looks great...but this show is poor. MC-kun needs a fucking slap
So the monters are human... meh, quite a common twist nowadays
He got all kinds of fucked up by the "Ghost" - which was cool. Fingers crossed he'll grow from this experience.
The first half was a glorified recap!
Did they just kill off bunny girl?
At least the Mayor is gone.
So  the "time demon" could be keisaku?..
Furry merged with Keisaku and became the big bad...
Good start, weak middle, trash late-game twist, and a definitive ending.
Well Ekoda is a character. I only watched the anime, skipped the "Director Chat" afterwards
Tut-tut. Stealing a another woman's man.
That was pretty fun. Lady to the right was great.
The blue chick at the beginning was hot.
...There was 1 decent-ish episode... the blackout one. ( There was a 12 ep... it was kak)
Good start. I do like that the shield hero's place in the world is different than the normal isekai
He's picked up Raph-chan...and she's already committed to following him
Raph-chan has aged up a bit and the first wave has passed.
This bitch be irredeemable!
Firo's introduction. Spear boy and Mine still cunting around
Firo stealing the show at the moment
Monster of the week, Raphtalia and Firo "competeing" for Naofumi's attention
Rage shield is cool. It'd be dope if he could master its power
Firo's feathers look like they'd make a good bed. As if spear boy could be more of a cunt...
Wave 2 be approaching!
The Iron Maiden thing was cool
What is wrong with the spear boy? At least the other heroes attempt to do something reasonable.
Raphtalia backstory...was nice
These episodes are getting dull...do something guys
It was a little funny. I like that they're taking the "dense guy" trope to the extreme
He was fucking with her right? He knew what was up right?
This guy is 100% in his own world and cannot be messed with.
Robo-Ueno and Tamon!
Poor Yamashita! New character is too energetic for me.
If she calmed down a little things wouldn't go so horribly wrong haha
Not all that fun this week
"It's really juicying up now" and "Virginal thighs"
Ueno continues to spack out
What are you doing Tanaka?
Fun show. Some of the skits were lame, but I liked the execution of most
What have I committed myself to watching? Why am I even alive.
This might be the worst thing I've ever watched. I think it is suppose to be shit though - some sort of parody/comedy angle
Shoot me
How can something like this get funded?
Abort it. How does this get made?
Picking up the baton from UzaMaid, grown woman being into loli's...
Not a fan of Noa
Mya-nee! She's trying to kill her in her sleep!
I like the Kanon and Koyori's dynamic. When she launched the printouts out the window I was rolling
University and the stalker! It seems a common trope for creepy MC's to have their own creeper (see: this and UzaMaid)
This girl has some issues. There needs to be some boundaries. At least Mya-nee tried.
Fun episode. I liked mixing it up with it being outside.
Run of the mill stuff.
Looks like Hana is softening to Mya-nee
The episodes are fun...CGDCT
A weak ending, but fun show overall.
Some of the CG was a little off, but otherwise decent start. Grace farm arc is best arc afterall
This unnerving look "mama" girves Emma in the hallway
Sister crone is mad scary. That sprinting!
...I'm blanking on what happens next. I remembered Ray was the "Traitor" but blank after that
Fucking Don, what a waster
Cat and mouse continues with the kids and adults
Krone is so damn creepy
Totally forgot what happened to Krone. Mama is cold as fuck - no hesitation on the leg breaking
Norman's eyes after seeing the cliff haha - I shouldn't find it funny though
Norman's gone and the guys are emoing out hard...
What the fuck are you doing Phil!?!?
They adapted the first arc fully. Was good. This is definitely the best arc in the series (to date at least)
